relation: NESDEC Final Report - North Smithfield Schools
PK-12 School Facilities Capacity and Grade Configuration Study
pageTitle: District Reconfiguration | North Smithfield School Department
textBeforeTable: Listed below is information provided by Mr. Stephen Lindberg, Superintendent of Schools, to the community regarding reconfiguration as well as the recommended process for determining the next “best” step for our school buildings.   The information listed from NESDEC [New England School Development Council] reflects the contracted work performed to assist with updating “data” in helping to determine possible “next steps”.   District Reconfiguration Home Search this site: Search Survey - Senior Project Reading Feedback Helpful Links Global Compliance Network (GCN) Training Employee Flu Clinic Payroll Info Discovery UnitedStreaming TieNet NSPS Email Virtual Office  Infinite Campus Facility Service Request IT Service Request AESOP Login NS PD Evaluation Form Training Teacher Guide GoogleApps RIDE's DataMap (SSO, EPSS, IMS) Staff Links
